newsitem.title: USA: MCI unit converts Brooks Fiber ownership to stock.
newsitem.headline: MCI unit converts Brooks Fiber ownership to stock.

text.p: Brooks Fiber Properties Inc said Tuesday that a subsidiary of MCI Communications Inc has exercised its options to convert its ownership interest in Brooks Fiber's San Jose and Sacramento markets into company common stock.
The transaction brings MCImetro Access Transmission Services Inc's total investment in Brooks to about 3.2 percent of its outstanding shares.
Brooks Fiber, a local telecommunications services company, is MCImetro's preferred provider of local access services in 17 markets.
In its last reporting period, Brooks Fiber reported 24,323,000 shares outstanding at June 30, 1996.
